greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Primes of the form abs(8n^2 - 488n + 7243) in order of increasing nonnegative values of n.
link: Robert Price, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4058
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime-Generating Polynomials
example: 5419 is in this sequence since 8*4^2 - 488*4 + 7243 = 128-1952+7243 = 5419 is prime.
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = for(n=0, nn, if(isprime(p=abs(8*n^2-488*n+7243)), print1(p, ", "))); \\ _Altug Alkan_, Apr 21 2016
results.author: _Robert Price_, Apr 21 2016
